text: Montell Daley (born 31 August 1994), known professionally as MoStack, is a British rapper, singer and songwriter from Hornsey in North London. After releasing a string of online songs and non-album singles between 2014–16, he released his debut mixtape, High Street Kid on 2 June 2017; which debuted at number 16 on the UK Albums Chart. His debut studio album, Stacko, was released on 7 June 2019; and debuted at number 3 on the UK Albums Chart. In addition to his own material, MoStack is also known for featuring on the hits single "No Words" (by Dave) and "Fashion Week" (by Steel Banglez); which peaked at number 17 and number 7 in the UK respectively.. == Personal life == MoStack is autistic. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of studio albums, with selected details !
